document.mc:Ignorable: w14 w15 w16se w16cid w16 w16cex wp14

r.t: Start of Block: Default Question Block (52 Questions)
1 TEXT_RADIO_1 - In the last working week, did you work as a production worker in a factory that makes or processes fibres (including wool), yarn or thread?
1A1 TEXT_RADIO_1A1 - In the last working week, did you work in an area making or processing fibres, yarn or thread?
1A1A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A1A1 - What type of fibres were the yarn or threads made or processed from?
If 1A1A1 = TEXT_1A1A1A Natural fibres (e.g., wool, cotton)
1A1A1A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A1A1A1 - What type of natural fibres were made or processed in the last working week?
1A1A1A1A1 TEXT_RADIO_1A1A1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you prepare the wool for carding or combing?
1A1A1A1A1A1 TEXT_RADIO_1A1A1A1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you apply oil to the wool?
1A1A1A1A1A1A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A1A1A1A1A1A1 - What types of oils did you apply to the wool?
TEXT_1A1A1A1A1A1A1A Natural or vegetable oils (e.g., olive oil, linseed oil) (1)
TEXT_1A1A1A1A1A1A1C Synthetic oils (e.g., polyol ester oils, silicone) (3)
1A2 TEXT_RADIO_1A2 - In the last working week, did you work in the weaving, knitting, or tufting area?
1A2A1 TEXT_RADIO_1A2A1 - In the last working week, were mineral oils applied to the fibres/yarn?
1A2A1A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A2A1A1 - How was the mineral oil applied?
TEXT_1A2A1A1C Manually applied with a brush (3)
1A3 TEXT_RADIO_1A3 - In the last working week, did you print fabric?
1A3A1 TEXT_RADIO_1A3A1 - In the last working week, did you clean the screens, rollers, or cylinders?
1A3A1A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A3A1A1 - What chemicals did you use to clean the screens, rollers, or cylinders in the last working week?
TEXT_1A3A1A1A Solvent based cleaners (e.g Petroleum distillates / hydrocarbon dry cleaners) (1)
1A4 TEXT_RADIO_1A4 - In the last working week, did you work in an area where fabric or fibres were made resistant to wrinkles, flame, stains, soil, shrinkage, water, moths, mildew, or something else?
1A4A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A4A1 - Which of the following processes did you apply to the fabric?
TEXT_1A4A1A Wrinkle resistance or durable or permanent press (1)
1A5 TEXT_RADIO_1A5 - In the last working week, were you indoors while working in a factory that makes or processes fibres, fabric, yarn or thread?
1A5A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A5A1 - How was the area ventilated?
TEXT_1A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
TEXT_1A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust / fumes away from your face (2)
TEXT_1A5A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
TEXT_1A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
TEXT_1A5A1E By open doors or windows (5)
TEXT_1A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
1A6 TEXT_RADIO_1A6 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection when you worked in a factory that made or processed fibres, fabric, yarn or thread?
1A6A1 TEXT_CHECK_1A6A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
TEXT_1A6A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
TEXT_1A6A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
TEXT_1A6A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
2 TEXT_RADIO_2 - In the last working week, did you work in warehousing and distribution?
1 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1 - In the last working week, did you drive, maintain, or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A1 TEXT_aDVM_CHECK_2A1_1A1 - What types of fuel did the vehicles that you drove, maintained or travelled in use?
aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
1A2 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A2 - In the last working week, did you fuel the vehicles yourself?
1A3 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A3 - In the last working week, did you drive or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
1A3A1 TEXT_aDVM_CHECK_2A1_1A3A1 - What types of roads or areas did you drive or travel on?
aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area (1)
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways) (2)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry (6)
1A4 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A4 - In the last working week, did you perform any maintenance work on vehicles?
1A4A1 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A4A1 - In the last working week, did you do tune ups, exhaust pipe work, or engine overhauls on the vehicles?
1A4A1A1 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A4A1A1 - In the last working week, did you attach a hose to the exhaust pipe of the vehicle you maintained to lead the exhaust fumes outside?
1A4A2 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A4A2 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches?
1A4A2A1 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU: 2005]?
1A4A4 TEXT_aDVM_RADIO_2A1_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
1A4A5 TEXT_aDVM_CHECK_2A1_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
1A4A5A1 TEXT_aDVM_CHECK_2A1_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?
aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aDVM_1A4A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
1 TEXT_aVEX_RADIO_2A2_1 - In the last working week, did you work in an area where there were vehicles driven or had their engines running?
1A1 TEXT_aVEX_CHECK_2A2_1A1 - What types of fuel were used in these vehicles?
aVEX_1A1C Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
1A2 TEXT_aVEX_CHECK_2A2_1A2 - Were these vehicles indoors or outdoors?
1A2A1 TEXT_aVEX_CHECK_2A2_1A2A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aVEX_1A2A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aVEX_1A2A1B By a general ventilation system (2)
aVEX_1A2A1C By fans in the window or doorway (3)
aVEX_1A2A1D By open doors or windows (4)
aVEX_1A2A1E No ventilation was applied to the area (5)
1A3 TEXT_aVEX_RADIO_2A2_1A3 - How far away did you work from these vehicles?
1A4 TEXT_aVEX_RADIO_2A2_1A4 - In the last working week, did you smell exhaust from the vehicles?
1 TEXT_aFAB_RADIO_3_1 - In the last working week, did you clean fabrics such as carpets, clothes or textiles?
1A1 TEXT_aFAB_CHECK_3_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following chemicals to clean stains from fabrics?
aFAB_1A1B Solvent- based cleaners (e.g. Petroleum distillates / hydrocarbon dry cleaners) (2)
1A2 TEXT_aFAB_CHECK_3_1A2 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?
aFAB_1A2A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFAB_1A2B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFAB_1A2C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFAB_1A2D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFAB_1A2E By open doors or windows (5)
aFAB_1A2F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
1 TEXT_aGLU_RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you handle or come in contact with glues, resins, bogs, or fillers?
1A1 TEXT_aGLU_RADIO_4_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use glues or adhesives?
1A1A2 TEXT_aGLU_CHECK_4_1A1A2 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following types of glues or adhesives?
aGLU_1A1A2B Plastic resin wood glue (also called urea-formaldehyde resin) (2)
1A1A2A1 TEXT_aGLU_RADIO_4_1A1A2A1 - In the last working week, did you use epoxy two-part glues?
1A4 TEXT_aGLU_RADIO_4_1A4 - In the last working week, were you indoors while handling or coming in contact with glues, resins, bogs, or fillers?
1A4A1 TEXT_aGLU_CHECK_4_1A4A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aGLU_1A4A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour at the emission point (1)
aGLU_1A4A1B By on-tool extraction to remove vapours away from your face (2)
aGLU_1A4A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aGLU_1A4A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aGLU_1A4A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aGLU_1A4A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
1A5 TEXT_aGLU_RADIO_4_1A5 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection while handling or coming in contact with glues, resins, bogs, or fillers?
1A5A1 TEXT_aGLU_CHECK_4_1A5A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aGLU_1A5A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aGLU_1A5A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aGLU_1A5A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
1 TEXT_aCLH_RADIO_5_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
1A1 TEXT_aCLH_CHECK_5_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following to clean your hands at work?
aCLH_1A1B Mineral turpentine, mineral spirits or white spirit or paint thinner (2)
